Class DBDB2Net

All Implemented Interfaces:
DB, IDMethod, java.io.Serializable
public class DBDB2Net
extends DBDB2App

This is used to connect via the NET-Driver to DB2 databases.

http://www-4.ibm.com/software/data/db2/
